ai.summary: This 9.9 km moderate hike around Felbrigg blends a historic church setting with tranquil lakeside scenery. The route weaves through woodland paths, lakeside esplanades, and open fields, offering chances to spot wildlife, quiet countryside views, and a relaxed pace suitable for hikers with moderate fitness. It can be completed as a loop from Felbrigg village or as an out-and-back to the lakes.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed terrain: well-maintained paths, gravel tracks, and grassy sections, with occasional boardwalks along the lakes. Expect gentle undulations and some muddy patches after rain; footwear with good grip is recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Always check the weather before you set out and be prepared for rain. Wear sturdy footwear and dress in layers; carry a waterproof jacket. Stay on marked paths, especially near the lakes and any edges, and keep an eye out for cyclists on shared routes. Supervise children and dogs, keeping them under control. Bring a map or GPS, and tell someone your plan and expected return time. Daylight hours can be limited in winter; plan accordingly.
recommended_gear: Sturdy hiking boots with good grip
Layered clothing and a waterproof jacket
Map, compass or GPS device; fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn for the best views, wildlife activity, and drier conditions; winter walks are possible but can be cold, muddy, and daylight is shorter.

seo.title: Church and Lakeside Walk, Felbrigg – 9.9 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a 9.9 km moderate hike at Felbrigg, featuring lakeside paths, woodland trails, and a historic church setting. A peaceful day out in the countryside of the UK.
